channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIPLUS TIM 1531 IRC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIPLUS TIM 1531 IRC

item.title: CVE-2022-40225|2024-08-03T12:14:39.855Z -- siemens -- siplus%20tim%201531%20irc
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIPLUS TIM 1531 IRC (6AG1543-1MX00-7XE0) (All versions < V2.4.8), TIM 1531 IRC (6GK7543-1MX00-0XE0) (All versions < V2.4.8). Casting an internal value could lead to floating point exception under certain circumstances. This could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service condition on affected devices.
